name: That Toilet... Feels so Good
description:
Working has drained all Zoe’s energy. The only resting time that Zoe can own is the short moment in the bathroom. Accidentally, Zoe fell asleep on that toilet today...

Control: 

  • 【Mouse click】 to interact.
  • 【A and D】 to move the hook.
  • 【S】 to drop the hook. 
  • 【W and S】to choose responses.

---------------------------------------------------------

P.S. Download to get better playing experience! :D
